articles.author: Chris Marshall-Bell
articles.title: 'I'm sorry': Uncontrollable tears for Tour de France rider who just misses out on stage win - CyclingWeekly
articles.description: What if that was Mattéo Vercher's one and only opportunity to win a stage in the Tour de France?
articles.content: Mattéo Vercher was crying uncontrollably. Hordes of people, everyone with a camera, circled around him. His back was pressed against the fencing, his feet dangled on the road, and his hands covered h… [+2823 chars]
